channel.title: Help with my server
channel.description: Everytime I try logging in it says Error Server must be down or Error Connecting to server... I have NO-IP running and my internet is connected but it still does it. Anyone know why thats happening? (I'm a begginer at making rsps' so idk how to fix this :S) EDIT: By the way if I have a Wireless Internet (AT&T Internet Simcard) how do I Portforward or do I need to?

item.title: Help with my server
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

Just change the client IP to local host. You don’t need to connect through your no-ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my server

item.description:

Everytime I try logging in it says Error Server must be down or Error Connecting to server… I have NO-IP running and my internet is connected but it still does it. Anyone know why thats happening? (I’m a begginer at making rsps’ so idk how to fix this :S)
